this.isActive?(this.sliderY=Math.max(0,this.sliderY),this.sliderY=Math.min(this.maxSliderTop,this.sliderY),this.$content.scrollTop(this.maxScrollTop*this.sliderY/this.maxSliderTop),this.iOSNativeScrolling||(this.updateScrollValues(),this.setOnScrollStyles()),this):void 0},j.prototype.scrollBottom=function(a){return this.isActive?(this.$content.scrollTop(this.contentHeight-this.$content.height()-a).trigger(p),this.stop().restore(),this):void 0},j.prototype.scrollTop=function(a){return this.isActive?(this.$content.scrollTop(+a).trigger(p),this.stop().restore(),this):void 0},j.prototype.scrollTo=function(a){return this.isActive?(this.scrollTop(this.$el.find(a).get(0).offsetTop),this):void 0},j.prototype.stop=function(){return y&&this.scrollRAF&&(y(this.scrollRAF),this.scrollRAF=null),this.stopped=!0,this.removeEvents(),this.iOSNativeScrolling||this.pane.hide(),this},j.prototype.destroy=function(){return this.stopped||this.stop(),!this.iOSNativeScrolling&&this.pane.length&&this.pane.remove(),d&&this.$content.height(\"\"),this.$content.removeAttr(\"tabindex\"),this.$el.hasClass(\"has-scrollbar\")&&(this.$el.removeClass(\"has-scrollbar\"),this.$content.css({right:\"\"})),this},j.prototype.flash=function(){return!this.iOSNativeScrolling&&this.isActive?(this.reset(),this.pane.addClass(\"flashed\"),setTimeout(function(a){return function(){a.pane.removeClass(\"flashed\")}}(this),this.options.flashDelay),this):void 0},j}(),a.fn.nanoScroller=function(b){return this.each(function(){var c,d;if((d=this.nanoscroller)||(c=a.extend({},z,b),this.nanoscroller=d=new q(this,c)),b&&\"object\"==typeof b){if(a.extend(d.options,b),null!=b.scrollBottom)return d.scrollBottom(b.scrollBottom);if(null!=b.scrollTop)return d.scrollTop(b.scrollTop);if(b.scrollTo)return d.scrollTo(b.scrollTo);if(\"bottom\"===b.scroll)return d.scrollBottom(0);if(\"top\"===b.scroll)return d.scrollTop(0);if(b.scroll&&b.scroll instanceof a)return d.scrollTo(b.scroll);if(b.stop)return d.stop();if(b.destroy)return d.destroy();if(b.flash)return d.flash()}return d.reset()})},a.fn.nanoScroller.Constructor=q}(jQuery,window,document);\n// ]]>\n// sourceMappingURL=jquery.nanoscroller.min.map\n</script>\n<link type=\"text/css\" rel=\"stylesheet\" #4E4E4E;position:absolute;right:0;top:4px}\n#prevx::after{border-color:transparent #4E4E4E transparent transparent;right:7px}\n.showpageArea a,.showpageArea .showpagePoint{display:inline-block;padding:5px 7px;margin:0 1px}\n.showpageArea a{background:#E0E0E0;border:1px solid #D1D1D1;text-decoration:none;color:black}\n.showpageArea .showpagePoint,.showpageArea a:hover{background:#222;border:1px solid black;color:white}\n\n\n  .post-outer .text-intro {\n    display: none;\n  }\n\n  a.morexpost {\n    display: none;\n  }\n</style>\n<style>\n.post h2.post-title {\nfont-size: 120%;\nmargin: 0 0 10px;\nfont-weight: 400;\nfont-family: 'Roboto Slab', serif;\nmargin-top: 20px;\n  }\n</style>\n<style>\n.article-within type=\"text/javascript\">\n// <![CDATA[\nvar domain = window.location.host;\n\n  var ContentLoader = function ContentLoader(widgetData) {\n      this.widgetData=widgetData;\n\t  this.id = (typeof(this.widgetData.summaryChar) == 'undefined') {\n\t  this.summaryChar = 200;\n    } else {\n    \tthis.summaryChar = this.widgetData.summaryChar;\n\t}\n\tif } else {\n    \tthis.autoload = this.widgetData.autoload;\n\t}\n\tif (typeof(this.widgetData.title) == 'undefined') {\n\t  this.title = false;\n    } else {\n    \tthis.title = this.widgetData.title;\n\t}\n\tif (typeof(this.widgetData.titleFirst) == 'undefined') {\n\t  this.titleFirst = false;\n    } else {\n    \tthis.titleFirst = this.widgetData.titleFirst;\n\t}\n\tif this.widgetData.startIndex;\n}\nif (typeof(this.widgetData.max) == 'undefined') {\nthis.max = null;\n} else {\nthis.max = this.widgetData.max;\n}\nthis.request = false;\nthis.complete = false;\nthis.initiate();\n  }\n\n\t\n  ContentLoader.prototype = {};\n  ContentLoader.prototype.initiate = function() {\n\tmyScroller.register(this.id,this);\n\tdocument.write('<div id='+this.id+'></div>');\n\tthis.container = $('body').find('#'+this.id);\n\tif (typeof(this.widgetData.class) != 'undefined') {\n\tthis.container.addClass(this.widgetData.class);\n\tthis.container.addClass('widget-container');\n\t}\n\tthis.ul = $('<ul>', {class: 'feed-list }\n\nContentLoader.prototype.loadButton = function() {\n\tthis.loadButton = $('<div>', {class: 'feed-load-button'});\n\tif (this.title != false) {\n\tthis.loadButton.text('Lagi yang '+this.title);\n\t} else if (this.label != '')  {\n\tthis.loadButton.text('Lagi yang '+this.label);\n\t} else {\n\tthis.loadButton.text('Lagi yang Terkini');\t\n}\n\tthis.container.append(this.loadButton);\n\tvar self = this;\n\tthis.loadButton.click(function() {\n\tself.tryLoad();\n});\n}\n\nContentLoader.prototype.loadfeed = function() { //by scroll or after load\nif ((this.index == this.startIndex) || ($(window).width() > 767 )) {\n\tthis.tryLoad();\n} else {\n}\n}\n\nContentLoader.prototype.tryLoad = function() {\n\tif ((this.complete == false) && (this.request == false)) {\n\tvar self = this;\nif (this.manualload == true) {\n\tthis.loadButton.text('Loading...');\n}\n\tvar feedurl = this.feed+'&start-index='+this.index;\n\tif (this.max != null) {\n\tfeedurl = feedurl+'&max-results='+this.max\n\t}\n    this.request = $.getJSON(feedurl,function(data) {\n\tself.request = false;\n\t\tself.process(data);\n\t\t\n\t});\n}\n}\n\nContentLoader.prototype.process = function(data) {\nvar count = 0;\nconsole.log(data);\nif(typeof(data.feed.entry) != 'undefined') {\n    for (i = 0; i<data.feed.entry.length; i++) {\n\t\tvar entry = data.feed.entry[i];\n\t\tif(typeof(entry) != 'undefined') {\n\t\tthis.index++;\n\t\tcount++;\n          if (this.whitelist != false ) {\n\t\tvar show = 0;\n          for (a1 = 0; a1<entry.category.length; a1++) {\n            if (entry.category[a1].term == this.whitelist) {\n\t\t\t\tshow = 1;\n            }\n          }\n          } else {\n\t\t\tvar show = 1;\n          }\n          if (show == 1) {\n\t\tvar item = new articleItem(entry,this.conf);\n\t\tthis.ul.append(item.li);\n\t\tvar actualH = item.h2.height();\n\t\titem.h2.css('white-space','nowrap');\n\t\tvar itemH = item.h2.height();\n\t\titem.h2.css('white-space','normal');\nif ((actualH)/itemH > 3) {\nitem.h2.css('max-height',(itemH*3));\nitem.h2.dotdotdot();\n}\n          }\n}\n    }\n} else {\nif (this.manualload == true) {\nthis.loadButton.remove();\n}\nthis.complete = true;\n}\nif (this.manualload == true) {\nif (this.title != false) {\n\tthis.loadButton.text('Lagi yang '+this.title);\n\t} else if (this.label != '')  {\n\tthis.loadButton.text('Lagi yang '+this.label);\n\t} else {\n\tthis.loadButton.text('Lagi yang Terkini');\t\n}\n}\nthis.customFunction();\nthis.scroll($(document).scrollTop(),'down');\n\n}\n\nContentLoader.prototype.customFunction = function() {\n\n}\n\nContentLoader.prototype.scroll = function(top,direction) {\nif (this.autoload == true) {\nif (direction == 'down') {\nif((this.container.height()+this.container.offset().top)-(top+$( window ).height()) < 150) {\nthis.loadfeed();\n}\n}\n}\n}\n\nvar articleItem = function articleItem(data,conf) {\n\tthis.data = data;\n\tthis.conf = conf;\n\tthis.bulan = new Array(\"Januari\", \"Februari\", \"Mac\", \"April\", \"Mei\", \"Jun\", \"Julai\", \"Ogos\", \"September\", \"Oktober\", \"November\", \"Disember\");;\n\tthis.initiate();\n}\n\narticleItem.prototype = {};\n\narticleItem.prototype.initiate = function() {\n\t\tthis.title = this.data.title.$t;\n\t\tvar content = this.data.summary.$t;\n\t\tvar categories = this.data.category;\n\t\tif (typeof(categories) != 'undefined') {\n\t\tvar catSize = categories.length;\n\t\t} else {\n\t\tvar catSize = 0;\n\t\t}\n\t\tvar today = 0;\n\t\tvar date = new Date(this.data.published.$t);\n\t\tvar day = date.getDate();\n        var month = date.getMonth();\n        var year = date.getFullYear();\n\t\tvar date = day+' '+ this.bulan[month] +' '+year;\n\t\tvar date2 = new Date();\n\t\tvar month2 = date2.getMonth()+1;\n        var day2 = date2.getDate();\n        var output = date2.getFullYear() + '-' +\n            ((''+month2).length<2 ? '0' : '') + month2 + '-'+ \n            ((''+day2).length<2 ? '0' : '') + day2;\n\t\tvar dateexplode = this.data.published.$t.split('T');\n  if (dateexplode[0] == output) {\n\ttoday = 1;\n  }\n\t\tthis.catUl = $('<ul>', {class: 'feed-label-list'});\n      \tfor this.data.media$thumbnail.url;\n\t\tvar image = image.replace('/s72-c/','/s' + this.conf.dimension + this.conf.crop + '/');\n  } else {\n\tvar image = 'http://i.imgur.com/x7NPC7i.jpg';\n  }\n\t\tvar p = /<\\S[^>]*>/g;\n\t\tvar y = content;\n        y = y.replace(p, \"\");\n        if (this.conf.showpostsummary == true) {\n            if (y.length > this.conf.summaryChar) {\n                y = y.substring(0, this.conf.summaryChar);\n                var e = y.lastIndexOf(\" \");\n                y = y.substring(0, e);\n                y = y + \"...\";\n            }\n        }\n\t\tthis.li = $('<a>', {class: 'feed-thumb-link',href: link});\n\t\tthis.thumb = $('<img>', {class: 'feed-thumb',src: image});\n        this.footer = $('<div>', {class: 'feed-footer'});\n\t\tthis.feedDate = $('<div>', {class: 'feed-date'});\n\t\tthis.feedDate.text(date);\n\t\tthis.feedDate.prepend($('<span>', {class: 'glyphicon glyphicon-calendar'}));\n\t\tthis.footer.append(this.feedDate);\n\t\tthis.athumb.append(this.thumb);\n\t\tthis.thumbContainer.append(this.athumb);\n\t\tthis.feedContainer.append(this.thumbContainer);\n 'feed-content'});\n\t\tthis.feedContainer.append(this.feedContent);\n\t\tif (this.conf.shareCounter == true) {\n\t\tthis.shares = $('<div>', {class: 'feed-title-link',href: link});\n\t\tthis.h2 = $('<h2>', {class: 'feed-title'});\n\t\tthis.h2.text(this.title);\n\t\tthis.ah2.append(this.h2);\nif (this.conf.titleFirst == true) {\nthis.feedContainer.prepend(this.ah2);\n} else {\n\t\tthis.feedContent.append(this.ah2);\n}\nif (this.conf.showpostsummary == true) {\nthis.sum = $('<div>', {class: 'feed-summary'});\nthis.sum.text(y);\nthis.feedContent.append(this.sum);\n}\n\t\tthis.feedContent.append(this.footer);\n}\n\nvar scroller = function scroller(document) {\nthis.doc = $(document);\nthis.lastScroll = this.doc.scrollTop();\nthis.lastDirection = null;\nvar self = this;\nthis.registered = {};\nthis.doc.scroll(function() {\n\tself.scrolling();\n});\n}\nscroller.prototype = {};\nscroller.prototype.scrolling = function() {\n\tif (this.doc.scrollTop() > this.lastScroll) {\nif (this.lastDirection != 'down') {\nthis.lastDirection = 'down';\n$('#tab').toggleClass('hide-tab');\n}\n} else {\nif (this.lastDirection != 'up') {\nthis.lastDirection = 'up';\n$('#tab').toggleClass('hide-tab');\n}\n}\nthis.lastScroll = this.doc.scrollTop();\n/*for(var obj in this.registered) {\nobj.scroll(this.lastScroll,this.lastDirection);\nconsole.log(obj);\n}*/\n\nfor (var key in this.registered) {\n   var obj = this.registered[key];\n   for (var prop in obj) {\n      if(obj.hasOwnProperty(prop)){\n       obj.scroll(this.lastScroll,this.lastDirection);\n      }\n   }\n}\n\n\n//console.log(this.lastDirection);\n}\n\nscroller.prototype.register = function(key,obj) {\n\tif (typeof(this.registered[key]) == 'undefined') {\n\tthis.registered[key] = obj;\n} else {\n\tconsole.log('Object with key '+key+' already registered');\n}\n}\n\n\nvar tabrider = function tabrider(title) {\n\tthis.registered = [];\n\tthis.elements = $(document).find('[tab]');\n\tthis.title = $(title);\n\tthis.originalTitle = this.title.text();\n\tthis.initiate();\n}\n\ntabrider.prototype = {};\ntabrider.prototype.initiate = function() {\nvar self = this;\nthis.elements.each(function(index) {\nself.registered.push({id: $(this).attr('tab'), offset: 0});\n$(this).click(function(){\n$('html,body').animate({\n          scrollTop: $('[tab-id='+$(this).attr('tab')+']').offset().top\n        }, 1000);\n\n});\n});\n}\n\n\ntabrider.prototype.scroll = function(top,direction) {\n\tvar self = this;\nif ($(window).width() <= 767) {\n\t$.each(this.registered, function( index, value ) {\n\t\tself.registered[index].offset = $('[tab-id='+self.registered[index].id+']').offset().top;\n\t});\n\tthis.registered = this.registered.sort(function(a, b) {   \n\t\treturn (b['offset'] > a['offset']) ? 1 : ((b['offset'] < a['offset']) ? -1 : 0);\n\t});\n\t$.each(this.registered, function( index, value ) {\n\t\tif (top > (self.registered[index].offset-80)) {\n\t\t\tself.elements.each(function(index2) {\n\t\t\t\tif($(this).attr('tab') != self.registered[index].id) {\n\t\t\t\t\t$(this).removeClass('active');\n\t\t\t\t} else {\n\t\t\t\t\t$(this).addClass('active');\n\t\t\t\t\tself.title.text($(this).attr('cotitle'));\n\t\t\t\t}\n\t\t\t});\n\t\treturn false;\n\t\t}\n\t\tself.title.text(self.originalTitle);\n\t});\n} else {\nself.title.text(self.originalTitle);\n}\n}\n\n$(document).ready(function(){\nvar tabobj = new tabrider('#title');\nmyScroller.register('tab',tabobj);\n});\nvar myScroller = new scroller(document);\n\n// ]]>\n</script>\n<script language=\"JavaScript\">\nvar today = new Date();\nvar dd = (\"0\"+today.getDate()).slice(-2);\nvar mm = today.getMonth() + 1;\nvar yyyy = today.getFullYear();\nvar todayDate = mm+'/'+dd+'/'+yyyy;\n// <![CDATA[\n//---start fblike\nfunction getCookie(c_name)\n{\nvar c_value = document.cookie;\nvar c_start = c_value.indexOf(\" \" + c_name + \"=\");\nif (c_start == -1)\n{\nc_start = c_value.indexOf(c_name + \"=\");\n}\nif (c_start == -1)\n{\nc_value = null;\n}\nelse\n{\nc_start = c_value.indexOf(\"=\", c_start) + 1;\nvar c_end = c_value.indexOf(\";\", c_start);\nif (c_end == -1)\n{\nc_end = c_value.length;\n}\nc_value = unescape(c_value.substring(c_start,c_end));\n}\nreturn c_value;\n}\n\nfunction setCookie(c_name,value,exdays)\n{\nvar exdate=new Date();\nexdate.setDate(exdate.getDate() + exdays);\nvar c_value=escape(value) + ((exdays==null) ? \"\" : \"; expires=\"+exdate.toUTCString());\ndocument.cookie=c_name + \"=\" + c_value + \"; path=/\";\n}\n\nfunction checkCookie()\n{\nvar fbfoce=getCookie(\"fblike\");\nvar fbhelpc=getCookie(\"fbhelpc\");\nif 1000);\n\n});\n\nfunction deleteCookie(c_name) {\n    document.cookie = encodeURIComponent(c_name) + \"=deleted; expires=\" + new Date(0).toUTCString();\n}\n// ]]>\n</script>\n<!-- OVER LIKE -->\n<script>\n// <![CDATA[\nvar fromFB = false;\nvar referrer = document.referrer;\n  if (referrer != '') {\nvar splitedreferrer = referrer.split( '/' );\nvar splitedreferrer =
